name: orbit-db-http-api
description: An HTTP API Server for the OrbitDB distributed peer-to-peer database

scripts.local: BOOTNODE=true SEED=TOM ADMIN_SEED_LIST=[] node src/cli.js api --ipfs-host 127.0.0.1 --orbitdb-dir .orbitdb --no-https --http1 --api-port 6001
scripts.other: BOOTNODE=true SEED=JERRY BOOTNODE=true node src/cli.js api --ipfs-host 127.0.0.1 --ipfs-port 5002 --orbitdb-dir .orbitdb --no-https --http1 --api-port 6002

author: Phillip Mackintosh, Hayden Young
